name: TopNatureSounds
0:
”Alexa, open top nature sounds”
”Alexa, start top nature sounds”
”Alexa, launch top nature sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top nature sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Top Nature Sounds lets you reproduce audio tracks of various nature, sea, and animals sounds. Use this skill when you need to feel calm and relaxed for a long day. 

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:
Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
